tasks.name: Get First Page & Generate Urls
tasks.xpath: {"001_nb_pages":"( xpath('//div[@id=\"pagn\"]/span') or xpath('//ul[@class=\"a-pagination\"]/li') )[-2].int() or (1 if xpath('//*[@data-asin]') else retry())","002_for url in [$sys.url] * $this.nb_pages":{"003___page":"$this.url.$key + 1","004___clean_url":"$this.url.$value.sub('[\\?&](page|ref)=[^&]+', '')","005_url":"$this.url.$this.__clean_url + '&page=' + $this.url.$this.__page + '&ref=sr_pg_' + $this.url.$this.__page"}}

tasks.name: Scrap Pages
tasks.xpath: {"001___products":"xpath('//*[@data-asin]', method='outerHTML') or retry()","002_for product in $this.__products":{"003_asin":"xpath('//@data-asin').str()","004_title":"xpath('//h2').str()","005_prime":"xpath('//i[contains(@class, \"a-icon-prime\")]', method='len').bool()","006_price":"xpath('//span[@class=\"a-price-whole\"]').float() or xpath('//span[@class=\"a-size-base a-color-price s-price a-text-bold\"]').float()","007_price_barred":"xpath('//span[@class=\"a-price a-text-price\"]').float() or xpath('//span[@class=\"a-size-small a-color-secondary a-text-strike\"]').float()","008_price_other":"xpath('//div[@class=\"a-row a-size-base a-color-secondary\"]/span[@class=\"a-color-base\"]').float() or xpath('//span[@class=\"a-size-base a-color-price a-text-bold\"]').float()","009_image":"xpath('//img[@class=\"s-image\"]/@src').str()","010_url":"xpath('//h2/a/@href').str().prefix($sys.stats.URL_SCHEME + '://' + $sys.stats.URL_NETLOC)"}}
